internship.task_selected: CLI Task Manager with JSON persistence

ai_usage.exact_usage: Used AI for brainstorming project scope and reviewing edge cases. Core implementation, commit structuring, debugging, and architectural decisions were done manually.

work_summary.what_i_built: A command-line task management application that supports adding, listing, completing, and deleting tasks with JSON-based persistence and input validation.
work_summary.hardest_part: Designing clean error handling while keeping the implementation simple and avoiding overengineering.
work_summary.what_breaks_when_scaled: The file-based storage approach becomes a bottleneck under concurrent access. Without file locking, simultaneous writes may corrupt data. Linear task lookup (O(n)) also degrades performance as data grows.
